tool_description: Fetches product review data from multiple sources including APIs, databases, and files, with filtering and pagination support.

data_sources.description: List of data sources to fetch from

max_reviews.description: Maximum number of reviews to fetch (1-10000)

error_messages: Invalid product_id: Product ID must be a non-empty string. Ensure the product exists in the system.
Empty data_sources: At least one data source must be specified. Use valid source names like 'amazon', 'google', 'internal_db'.
Invalid date range: date_from must be earlier than date_to. Use ISO 8601 format.
Max reviews out of range: max_reviews must be between 1 and 10000. Adjust the limit to avoid memory issues.
Data source unavailable: One or more specified data sources are currently unavailable. Check source connectivity.
usage: Provide product_id and data_sources array. Optionally set date range and max_reviews limit. The tool will fetch and return raw review data from specified sources.

sources_processed.description: List of successfully processed data sources

raw_reviews.description: Array of raw review data strings
